title: Endura Ergonomistry Project results in Women’s Pro SL EGM Bibshort w/ new tech & fit
content:
When it comes to their new women’s Pro SL EGM bibshorts, Endura says they busted taboos by addressing women’s saddle discomforts in order to make the industry’s best women’s bike short ever. Endura worked with renowned physiotherapist and ergonomist Phil Burt. The R&D team also included a “jury” of women of differing experiences and body […]

The post Endura Ergonomistry Project results in Women’s Pro SL EGM Bibshort w/ new tech & fit appeared first on Bikerumor.
author: Chelsey Magness
